name: Compliance Scan
description: Compliance Scan events report the start, completion, and overall result of the scan. Detailed results are reported in individual compliance events.

name.description: The name of the compliance scan job.

uid.name: Scan UID
uid.description: The unique identifier of the scan job.

3.name: Soft Fail
3.description: The host integrity check failed, but was reported as Passed.

end_time.description: The end time of the compliance scan job.

start_time.description: The start time of the compliance scan job.

time.description: The time when the compliance scan report was created.

1.name: Manual
1.description: The scan was manually initiated by the user or admin.

2.name: Scheduled
2.description: The scan was started based on scheduler.
